synopsis.text: Hoping to break a curse that threatens his lineage, Prince Oscar embarks on a perilous journey to the Azure Tower, home of the powerful and enigmatic witch, Tinasha. Despite the countless challenges and battles against her servant creatures, Oscar successfully reaches the top, where he is met with an unexpected sight: a beautiful, youthful witch with power rivaling that of the one who cursed his family. In a bold move, Oscar proposes marriage to Tinasha, believing her strength can circumvent the curse. Although reluctant, Tinasha agrees to live in Oscar's castle for a year to investigate the curse. As time passes, the witch's dark secrets begin to unravel, and the prince finds himself not only fighting for his lineage but also for the heart of the bewitching Tinasha. Will their alliance lead to the salvation of the kingdom, or will it bring forth an even greater calamity?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
